name: Rolling Wizards
description:
Choose your wizard type, click to roll a dice that will decide which enemy you will face.

During a fight, click to roll a dice that will randomly decide your base damage. Then, stop a spinning dice on the same face to double the number ! Finally, each wizard has an element. When you attack, you get a spinning dice with each element on it. Which element you stop it on will also increase or decrease your damage based on the opponent's element.

Fire is good against Grass

Water is good against Fire

Earth is good against Water

Grass is good against Earth

Winning a fight will give you xp ( and increase your level = more damage and more hp ), but also increase your rank meaning you will fight higher level enemies. Losing fights will decrease your rank by 3 meaning you will start fighting lower level enemies again.

Game offered in HTML with a fullscreen button. If it is lagging or if you want better quality and a safer save system, you can try the executable. 

This game was made for the GTMK Game Jam 2022 !
